articles.title: Goa
articles.description: A popular and fun-filled destination, Goa has many resorts and beaches that can host a lively and memorable wedding.

articles.title: Udaipur
articles.description: The city of lakes and palaces, Udaipur offers a royal and romantic setting for a destination wedding

articles.title: Kerela
articles.description: For a serene and scenic wedding, Kerala is a great option.Kerala also offers a rich culture and cuisine that will add to the charm of your wedding14.

articles.title: Andaman and Nicobar Islands
articles.description: If you want a tropical and exotic wedding, the Andaman and Nicobar Islands are a dream destination

articles.title: Agra
articles.description: If you want to celebrate your love in the city of love, Agra is the perfect place for you. You can have a romantic wedding in front of the Taj Mahal, the symbol of eternal love

articles.title: Jaisalmer
articles.description: For a desert-themed wedding, Jaisalmer is a unique and stunning choice. You can get married in the golden sand dunes, under the starry sky, or in the majestic forts and havelis that reflect the rich culture and heritage of Rajasthan.

articles.title: Mussoorie
articles.description: The Doon Valley, the majestic Himalayas, and a brilliant night sky filled with dazzling stars provide the perfect setting for your D-Day.
